data.actual_result: On Android they are sorted in the following way: 1) Users you are friends with, sorted by userID ; 2) Users you are NOT friends with, sorted by userID, including yourself
data.expected_result: As on Desktop, users should be sorted from first to last person who added reaction
data.short_description: Users in reactions list are not sorted in the same way as desktop client
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message with a lot of reactions  - Open the reactions list
